imdb.plot outline: A look at industries facing disruption today. This seconds series takes a look at the disruption modern cities face from increasing urbanisation, the disruption the healthcare industry faces from tech, and how banks are helping to disrupt criminal trafficking organisations. Told as global stories.
imdb.title: The Distrupters
plot: 3 x 20' documentary series exploring the pressures of change confronting modern day society and the industries striving to adapt.

A look at industries facing disruption today. This seconds series takes a look at the disruption modern cities face from increasing urbanisation, the disruption the healthcare industry faces from tech, and how banks are helping to disrupt criminal trafficking organisations. Told as global stories.::Alex Buxton
